title: Write
introducing-synapsy-text: Synapsy Write is a new way of writing text, using the power of AI.
welcome-desc: Welcome to AI Generation, to get started, enter your OpenAI API key.
result-ph: The generated text will appear here.
no-gen-text: You can find here all your generations.
features-desc: Discover the versatile features of Synapsy Write
feature-ai-desc: Harness the state-of-the-art AI technology provided by OpenAI to generate high-quality text based on your input.
feature-versatile-desc: Create different types of writing from a single instruction. Write lets you create emails, paragraphs, essays and much more!
feature-easy-desc: The intuitive user interface ensures that even non-technical users can get started quickly. You can start generating writings in seconds.
open-source-desc: Synapsy's products follow Peyronnet Group's vision: Open-source as a core value. We want to have this journey with you and the community.
temp-desc: Controls randomness: lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.
freq-penalty-desc: How much to penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far. Decreases the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbalism.
pres-penalty-desc: How much to penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far. Increases the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
top-p-desc: Control diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered.
max-length-desc: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,000 tokens, shared between prompt and completion. The exact limit varies by model.
name: Name
format-desc: A generation format is a mode in which Synapsy Write generates text.
settings-desc: Manage the configuration of Synapsy Write.
theme-desc: Set the appearance of Synapsy Write
openai-options-desc: Set your settings with the OpenAI integration.
account-desc: Welcome to Peyronnet Account â€“ where your journey begins! Unify your digital experience with us and unlock a world of seamless connectivity. Sign in to access exclusive features, personalized services, and a platform designed to elevate your online interactions.
account-tip: Experience the power of seamless integration with Synapsy's suite of AI products. Our cutting-edge technology seamlessly integrates with various platforms, offering unparalleled compatibility and efficiency
your-info-desc: Manage and edit information about your account.
name-desc: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
email-desc: Please enter the email address you want to use to login.
email-notify: We will email you to verify the change.
products-available: You have bought/subscribed to some of our products.
available-products-desc: Find all available products and plans of Peyronnet Group.
synapsy-available-products-desc: Find all available plans of Synapsy Write.
account-read-only-1: You can not edit your information in this website. Please visit
unlock-power-ai: Unlock the power of AI with the Peyronnet Account.
unlock-ai-sub: Unlock the power of AI by choosing a subscription plan.
variables-desc: Use variables to create interactive and reusable generations.
tables-desc: Generate complex tables that fit your needs from a single prompt.
essays-desc: Generate complex and realist essays using Write's custom generation engine.
unlimited-access-desc: Get unlimited access and infinite generations by subscribing to a plan.
github-desc: Write's repo is publicly available on GitHub.
link-text: Don't have an account? Sign up
sign-in-link-text: Already have an account? Sign in
confirmation-text: Check your email for the confirmation link
password-confirmation-text: Check your email for the password reset link
pricing-desc: You need a subscription plan to use Synapsy Write.
text-desc: Just start typing with plain text.
todo-desc: Track tasks with a to-do list.
image-desc: Upload an image from your computer.
why-synapsy-desc: ChatGPT Plus can be useful, but Synapsy Write offers some exclusive features that will greatly improve your productivity.
ai-desc: Use AI entirely to generate documents or essays.
complex-gen-desc: You are using a complex generation that will takes several steps to complete.
chat-desc: Chat with Synapsy Assistant to improve your documents or get information about them.
chat-placeholder-desc: The Synapsy Assistant is here to answer all your questions and queries.
chat-placeholder-desc2: Enter a message to get started.
system-template-creator-desc: Create a template to use as System prompt when creating a conversation with Synapsy Assistant.
no-templates-desc: You can create a system template to influence the way the Assistant will interact with you.
unlock-potential-desc: Synapsy Write is designed to help you create high-quality content with ease. Boost your productivity, enhance your creativity, and take your writing to new heights.
effortless-text-gen-desc: Synapsy Write's advanced AI algorithms generate high-quality text with just a few prompts, saving you time and effort.
productivity: Boost Your Productivity with Synapsy Write
productivity-desc: Synapsy Write's powerful features and intuitive interface empower you to create high-quality content faster than ever before.
text-editor-desc: Synapsy Write allows you to directly edit your generations within the app, removing the need to use other third-party apps.
advanced-instructions-desc: Synapsy Write's advanced model instructions enable you to fine-tune the AI to your specific needs, ensuring high-quality and tailored content.
text-analysis-desc: Synapsy Write's advanced text analysis tools provide valuable insights and feedback to help you improve your writing.
generation-font-desc: Select the font style for the text content.
system-templates-desc: Create system prompts for Synapsy Assistant.
openai-models-desc: See all available OpenAI Models for your account.
prompt-desc: Enter the prompt for the AI to generate the document.
template-desc: The templates feature allows to create structured, step-by-step workflows for generating complex documents.
hide-content: Not included in the final generation
no-user-templates-desc: Create a template to get started.
delete-confirm-desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this template.
prompt-var: The PROMPT variable contains the prompt provided by the user in the Create page.
var-usage: You can use the content stored by this variable by using
email-sign-in: Enter your email below to login to your account
sign-email-password: Sign in with email and password
models-desc: See all available models for your account.
blog-desc: Articles and updates from the team
privacy-desc: Learn more about our policies relative to your privacy
youtube-desc: Watch our videos about our products
x-desc: Follow us on X to get te latest updates
cgv-desc: Find out more about our general terms and conditions of sale
prompt-var-missing: The [[PROMPT]] variable is missing. The prompt provided by the user will not be provided to the model.
reset-data-desc: This will reset all your data and settings. Are you sure?
